body_html:
Workaround:
I had this issue when I wanted to use batch_norm right after a conv2d_transpose. The conv2d_transpose loses all shape information about the output tensor. batch_norm requires the number of channels to be statically known. I found a workaround by using tf.reshape() right after the conv2d_transpose. This regains the static shape information.

body:
**Workaround:**
I had this issue when I wanted to use batch_norm right after a conv2d_transpose. The conv2d_transpose loses all shape information about the output tensor. batch_norm requires the number of channels to be statically known. I found a workaround by using tf.reshape() right after the conv2d_transpose. This regains the static shape information.
